pages.title: Paper Wings
pages.text: Paper wings can be crafted simply in a crafting table with 3 paper in a row. It's vital in the creation of cruelty-free butterfly wings. By combining the paper wings in the crafting table with a cotton ball containing butterfly DNA of some kind will result in the production of butterfly wings which can used to decorate elytras or for display.

pages.title: Cotton Ball
pages.text: Crafted using some wool and quartz, the cotton ball can be used to gently extract the essence of a butterfly in order to recreate it's wings using paper and cotton. Simply right clicking any butterfly with a cotton ball will return you a cotton ball with the data of that butterfly smeared onto it.
